General.Name: Winnergy Medical Public Company Limited
General.Description: Winnergy Medical Public Company Limited engages in the distribution of medical and diagnostic equipment in Thailand. The company sells women healthcare products, which includes down's syndrome and genetic screening test, pregnancy monitoring, and cervical dilators; equipment for testing blood quality to donate blood; blood infection testing products; and stem cell and contamination analysis products. It also sells mosquito trappers for outdoor and indoor use; and offers COVID-19 diagnostic lab services. The company was formerly known as Winnergy Medical Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Winnergy Medical Public Company Limited in September 2020. Winnergy Medical Public Company Limited was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

4.Name: Mr. Boontalerng  Khampuanboot
4.Title: Chief Sales & Marketing Officer of Diagnostic, Blood Bank & Cell Technology and Director
